    • Method Detail

      • initializeOpenSAML

        private void initializeOpenSAML()
                         throws java.lang.RuntimeException
        OpenSAML needs to be initialized before it can be used
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if the initialization fails a RuntimeError needs to be thrown because no AuthnRequest can be generated even the Assertion can not be parsed

        Gets the first request from user and makes redirect to IdP
        Returns:
        Redirect to IdP
        Throws:
        java.net.URISyntaxException - throws Exception if redirect URL is not a valid URI

                                                                                                                                                                           @RequestHeader

        Authorization - contains the Authorization header with the bearer token

        Authorization - contains the Authorization header with the bearer token
        Returns:
